resources.string: 1.0\n\t- first public version
1.0.1\n\t- bug fixed
1.0.2\n\t- fixed fullscreen issue\n\t- Russian translation
1.1\n\t- added option for show status bar only (without pull down)\n\t- German translation (thanks to Helge Foerster)

1.2
	- updated Russian translation
	- Polish translation (thanks to Ostry10)
	- possibility to change vibration feedback strength
	- Android 2.2+ compatibility
1.2.1\n\t- fixed issue on CM roms in expanded desktop mode

1.2.2
	- added changelog
	- updated translations
	- Spanish translation (thanks to Haptein)
	- fixed small bugs
1.2.3\n\t- small improvements
1.2.4\n\t- improve behavior in case of the low RAM
1.2.5\n\t- updated Russian translation (thanks to Олег Глядков)
1.3\n\t- fixed expanded desktop mode on some ROMs\n\t- option to change touch area position and width

1.3.1
	- Italian translation (thanks to neo_user)
	- fixed expanded desktop mode on some ROMs
	- other small fixes
1.3.2\n\t- Hungarian translation (thanks to gidano)\n\t- updated translations
1.3.3\n\t- updated translations\n\t- fixed bugs
1.3.4\n\t- Slovak translation (thanks to pyler)\n\t- updated translations

1.3.5
	- SwipeStatusBar should be "unkillable" by system
	- Romanian translation (thanks to Mihai Zavoian)
	- fixed small bugs

1.3.6
	- Hebrew translation (thanks to Elyashiv Sabach)
	- French translation (thanks to Mistermatt007)
	- added support for Android Backup Service
	- compatibility with AOKP ROMs
	- fixed bug in countries without in-app billing
	- fixed behavior when status bar not slide on some devices
	- fixed behavior in non-fullscreen applications
	- updated translations
	- other little changes
1.3.7\n\t- fixed bug when navigation bar is visible
1.3.8\n\t- Slovenian translation (thanks to Lukc Orglce)\n\t- fixed behavior with high sensitivity and no full screen apps
1.3.9\n\t- bug fixes\n\t- Chinese translation (thanks to Lam Tsz Ki)

1.4
	- fixed left swipe gesture on some devices
	- added alternative mode for better compatibility
	- removed start on boot option
1.4.1\n\t- updated translations\n\t- bug fixes
1.4.2\n\t- correct alternative mode

1.4.3
	- correct width of gesture area
	- disable wake up when screen is off
	- updated translations
1.4.4\n\t- update translations \n\t- code clean up
1.4.5\n\t- Turkish translation (thanks to Hakan Güven)
1.4.6\n\t- small changes
1.5\n\t- added ability for permanently visible status bar (BETA - back button do not work)
